PAGETITLE: Kranji War Memorial Landmark in Singapore
OVERVIEW: The Kranji War Memorial in Singapore honours the men and women from the Commonwealth who died in the line of duty during World War II.

PAGETITLE: The Cenotaph - a Singapore War Memorial Landmark
OVERVIEW: This war memorial in Esplanade Park honours the heroes who fought and died during World War I and World War II.
